1.0.0.name: wordpress/gc-message-box
1.0.0.description:
How GC Message Box helps your website

This customizable plugin gets you more conversion by placing a nice looking message box displaying your main message and/or Call To Action inside your articles and blog posts. It highlights your main message in a smart way and easily converts them if required.

Key beneficial areas

  • Driving traffic
  • Highlighting key messages within a post
  • Capturing leads
  • Selling products
  • Promoting blog posts
  • Converting visitors into your funnel

What's new about GC Message Box 2?

Thanks to the ongoing conversation with our users and the GC Community the new generation of GC plugins, including many feature requests by users, has been launched with:
  • Awesome new user interface
  • Conversion tracking with a cool dashboard: MY.GetConversion
  • Manage all your sites and GC plugins at one place
  • Better decision making based on real
